item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, November 26, 2024 at 8:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Launch HN: Human Layer (YC F24) – Human-in-the-Loop API for AI Systems (135 points | 70 comments)
2. Teen Mathematicians Tie Knots Through a Mind-Blowing Fractal (25 points | 1 comment)
3. A solution to The Onion problem of J. Kenji Lopez-Alt (2021) (201 points | 71 comments)
4. The AI reporter that took my old job just got fired (144 points | 147 comments)
5. We can mine asteroids for space food (82 points | 60 comments)
6. LLVM-powered devirtualization (128 points | 2 comments)
7. Show HN: SQLite Plugin for Jekyll (129 points | 39 comments)

10. Henry James and H.G. Wells (1958) (39 points | 24 comments)
11. Hats Off to NASA's Webb: Sombrero Galaxy Dazzles in New Image (11 points | discuss)
12. Setelinleikkaus: When Finns snipped their cash in half to curb inflation (158 points | 146 comments)
13. A slave narrative resurfaces after nearly 170 years (87 points | 36 comments)
14. DEA passenger searches halted after watchdog finds signs of rights violations (111 points | 105 comments)
15. California's most neglected group of students: the gifted ones (170 points | 226 comments)
16. Remembering Cyberia, the first ever cyber cafe (68 points | 53 comments)
17. A Short Introduction to Automotive Lidar Technology (222 points | 162 comments)

19. Dissecting M8trix (3 points | discuss)
20. Y Combinator often backs startups that duplicate other YC companies, data shows (266 points | 141 comments)
21. One Billion Nested Loop Iterations (14 points | 6 comments)
22. Building LLMs is probably not going be a brilliant business (50 points | 48 comments)
23. Tunable ultrasound propagation in microscale metamaterials (17 points | 2 comments)
24. Poisoning the Day (145 points | 60 comments)
25. 'The Best of All Possible Worlds' Review: Leibniz Lives Again (65 points | 46 comments)
26. Show HN: Gemini LLM corrects ASR YouTube transcripts (160 points | 97 comments)
27. A Revolution in How Robots Learn (17 points | 2 comments)
28. Revisiting the DOS Memory Models (160 points | 87 comments)
29. Building a Sync Engine in Clojure [video] (22 points | 1 comment)
30. Amazon S3 Adds Put-If-Match (Compare-and-Swap) (479 points | 146 comments)
